scripts.start: npm run build && pm2 startOrRestart ./ecosystem.config.js --env production
scripts.publish-gh-pages: next build && next export -o docs && cd docs && touch .nojekyll && touch CNAME && echo 'stackbunch.com' | tee CNAME && cd _next && touch .gitkeep && cd ../ && git init && git remote add origin git@github.com:blastZ/blastz.github.io.git && git add . && git commit -m 'Build' && git push --force origin master
